title: Best Friends Q and U
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 68 words, Level D (Grade 1), Lexile 210L, Fiction Series
description: Best Friends Q and U is the story of a dynamic duo and their adventures together. Through simple text and colorful illustrations, students are introduced to the digraph qu in an entertaining and engaging context. The book can also be used to identify the author's purpose and practice the skill of retelling.
reviewWords: earthquake, quilt, square, squeal, squint, squish
comprehension: Author's Purpose                : Determine the author’s purpose
awareness: Short Vowel Sounds                : Discriminate short vowel /i/ sound
grammar: Subject-Verb Agreement                : Recognize and create subject-verb agreement
wordWork: Alphabetical Order                : Place words in alphabetical order
